7.text: The bus conductor: You’re welcome. Could someone please give a

9.text: Rusiru : Here, I’ll give you mine.

10.text: Old lady: Thank you for being such a kind boy. Where are you going?

11.text: Rusiru : We are going to the hospital since my father was admitted there a few days ago.

12.text: Old lady: Oh, I’m sorry to hear that. I hope he’ll get well soon. I’m going there too as I have to see a doctor.

13.text: Mother: Rusiru, ring the bell.... move forward so we could get off quickly. Could you help the old lady to get off the bus?

17.text: 1. Who is at the bus stop? 2. Where are Rusiru and his mother going? 3. Why are they going there? 4. Who will help the old lady to get off the bus?

20.text: • We are going to the hospital since my father was admitted there

21.text: a few days ago. • I’m going there too as I have to see a doctor. • Rusiru, ring the bell and move forward, so we could get off

23.text: The highlighted words are called conjunctions.
